exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="thumb" width="30" height="8" x="0" verticalCenter="0" ellipseWidth="8" fillAlpha="0.58"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  width="990" height="560">
	<w:Config id="15f8118d53a" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="timg2_jpg"/>
	<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" top="226" bottom="150">
		<e:Image source="load_bg_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="7.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="509" anchorOffsetY="0" height="67.26" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group width="502" height="59" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="2.5" horizontalCenter="-0.5">
			<e:Image id="bar" source="loading_bar_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" scale9Grid="8,1,584,58" anchorOffsetX="0" width="502" anchorOffsetY="0" height="48.81" left="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label id="progress" text="资源加载" anchorOffsetX="0" width="217" anchorOffsetY="0" height="82" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="21" horizontalCenter="0.5" textColor="0xffffff" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image source="load_ui_box_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" alpha="0.5" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="thumb" width="8" height="30" horizontalCenter="0" fillAlpha="0.58" ellipseWidth="8"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="DiamondsItemSkin" width="661" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="160c5dabcd2"/>
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x262932"/>
		<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" right="22" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xde433f" ellipseWidth="20"/>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
				<e:Label id="money" text="￥100 购买" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="26" y="35" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="26"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="15" paddingRight="15" paddingTop="20" paddingBottom="20"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="288" height="37" x="92" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" verticalCenter="-20.5">
			<e:Label id="diamonds" x="10" y="3" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" text="100" textColor="0xf2a204" size="30"/>
			<e:Label x="20" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" text="钻石" size="28" textColor="0xffffff"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="92" y="54" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xE08100" ellipseWidth="20"/>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
			<e:Label id="award" text="额外赠送" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="22" x="31" y="9" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="8" paddingRight="8" paddingTop="8" paddingBottom="8"/>
			</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image x="20" verticalCenter="0" y="27" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="zuanshi_icon_png"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PayCheckBoxSkin" states="up,upAndSelected,downAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1"                                                                     source.up="checkbox_unselect2_png" source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up2_png" source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_up2_png" source="checkbox_unselect2_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="22"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x999999"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PayItemSkin" width="661" height="104" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="160c5dabcd2"/>
	<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x262932"/>
		<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" right="22" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xde433f" ellipseWidth="20"/>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
				<e:Label id="money" text="￥100 购买" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="26" y="35" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="26"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="15" paddingRight="15" paddingTop="20" paddingBottom="20"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group width="288" height="37" x="92" y="13" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Label id="coin" x="10" y="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" text="100"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="92" y="54" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xe08100" ellipseWidth="20"/>
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
				<e:Label id="award" text="额外赠送" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="22" x="31" y="9" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout paddingLeft="8" paddingRight="8" paddingTop="8" paddingBottom="8"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image x="17.88" verticalCenter="0" y="27" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="common_jd_png"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="PayPanelSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" height="700">
	<e:Rect id="close_bg" fillAlpha="0.4" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Group width="661" horizontalCenter="0" scaleX="0.85" scaleY="0.85" anchorOffsetY="0" top="20" bottom="20">
		<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0" bottom="0" top="56" x="0" y="56" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" ellipseWidth="40" fillColor="0x262932"/>
			<e:Group id="loading_group" y="285.08" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" horizontalCenter="0.5">
				<e:Rect height="50" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" width="528" verticalCenter="0" ellipseWidth="23" fillAlpha="0.2" fillColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
				<e:Label id="tips0" text="数据加载中..." x="201" verticalCenter="0" size="18"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Scroller id="scroller" anchorOffsetY="0" top="269" bottom="38.66999999999996" anchorOffsetX="0" width="619.66" scrollPolicyH="off" horizontalCenter="0.5">
			<e:Group id="scroller_box" anchorOffsetY="0">
				<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout horizontalAlign="justify" verticalAlign="top"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			</e:Scroller>
			<e:Group height="82" y="52.7" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0">
			<e:Group width="236" height="59" x="58" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
				<e:Rect left="43" right="8" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="33" verticalCenter="0" ellipseWidth="33" fillColor="0x181e2d" strokeWeight="2" strokeColor="0x646e84"/>
				<e:Image source="common_jd_png" x="13.76" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="47.59" anchorOffsetY="0" height="41.75"/>
				<e:Label id="coin" text="- -" x="68.5" size="26" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="236" height="59" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="364">
				<e:Rect left="43" right="8" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="33" verticalCenter="0" ellipseWidth="33" fillColor="0x181E2D" strokeWeight="2" strokeColor="0x646E84"/>
				<e:Image x="17.3" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0.5" source="zuanshi_icon_png"/>
				<e:Label id="diamonds" text="- -" x="68.5" size="26" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
			</e:Group>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group y="136.17" anchorOffsetY="0" left="0" right="0">
			<e:Rect ellipseWidth="40" fillColor="0x1f2025" anchorOffsetX="0" height="50" width="580" top="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Label text=" 适度娱乐，理性消费！" textColor="0x727890" horizontalCenter="0" size="26" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image source="modal_bg_top_png" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="title" text="充值金币" y="52.34" horizontalCenter="0.5" size="34" x="263" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group id="pay_group" width="580" height="54" y="255.1" horizontalCenter="0.5">
			<e:CheckBox id="auto_zh" label="购买钻石转换金币" x="53" y="15.5" skinName="skins.PayCheckBoxSkin" selected="true"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout gap="0" paddingRight="0" paddingLeft="0" horizontalAlign="left" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="TagPayBotton" width="200" height="54" currentState="up" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" states="down,up" >
	<e:Rect ellipseWidth="54" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="-39" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0x1f2025" fillColor.down="0xd54535" left.up="0" right.up="0" top.up="0" bottom.up="0" ellipseWidth.up="0" left.down="0" right.down="0" top.down="0" bottom.down="0" ellipseWidth.down="0"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" text="Label" textAlign="center" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" verticalAlign="middle" size="26"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="BounsSkin" width="135" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image source="2017110116163155709007_png" x="8" anchorOffsetX="0" width="17" anchorOffsetY="0" height="22.88" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="bouns" text="+1000" x="30" size="18" textColor="0xffba26" bold="true" italic="true" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" y="4"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameUISkin" width="990" height="560" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image source="bg2_jpg" width="100%" height="100%"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="750" height="550">
		<e:Image source="bg_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" x="160" y="-106" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
			<e:Group id="grd0" width="135" height="142" x="120.03" y="152.02" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" blendMode="normal" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group id="sbx0" left="6" right="-6" top="2" bottom="-2" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong001" horizontalCenter="13.5" bottom="-4" pixelHitTest="true"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="316.81" y="151.38" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd1" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-3" right="3" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx1" x="-310.81" y="-158.38" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong000" horizontalCenter="3.5" bottom="-3" x="3.1899999999999977" y="350.62" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="510.04" y="156.7" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd2" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx2" x="-504.03999999999996" y="-163.7" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong002" horizontalCenter="7.5" bottom="-3" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="100.33" y="246.65" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd3" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-4" right="4" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx3" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong005" horizontalCenter="4.5" bottom="0" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="321.68" y="245.53" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd4" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-7" right="7" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx4" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong004" horizontalCenter="0.5" bottom="-2" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="523.34" y="245.53" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd5" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-11" right="11" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx5" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong003" horizontalCenter="-0.5" bottom="-2" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="99.18" y="343.03" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd6" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-8" right="8" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx6" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong006" horizontalCenter="-0.5" bottom="-1" pixelHitTest="true" touchEnabled="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="321.68" y="347.02" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd7" scrollEnabled="true" touchEnabled="false">
				<e:Group left="-6" right="6" top="0" bottom="0" id="sbx7" touchEnabled="false">
				</e:Group>
				<e:Image source="kong_json.kong007" horizontalCenter="-0.5" bottom="-2" pixelHitTest="true"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group width="135" height="142" x="542.66" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" id="grd8" scrollEnabled="true" y="349" touchEnabled="false">

<e:Skin class="HelpSkin" width="724" height="456" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="btn_close" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillAlpha="0"/>
	<e:Group horizontalCenter="-12.5" verticalCenter="-1.5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="623" anchorOffsetY="0" height="433">
		<e:Rect fillAlpha="0.58" ellipseWidth="23" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Rect width="2" x="302" fillColor="0x2caa08" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" top="20" bottom="20"/>
		<e:Scroller anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" height="342" width="274" y="74" x="13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Group>
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="201">
				<e:Image source="shu_json.shu001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.83" verticalCenter="0"/>
				<e:Label text="萌萌鼠 奖励 * 2倍" x="91" verticalCenter="1" size="22"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" y="10" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="201" x="10">
				<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.83" verticalCenter="0" source="shu_json.shu006"/>
				<e:Label text="矿矿鼠 奖励 * 5倍" x="91" verticalCenter="1" size="22"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" y="40" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="201" x="40">
				<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.83" verticalCenter="0" source="shu_json.shu010"/>
				<e:Label text="海盗鼠 奖励 * 10倍" x="91" verticalCenter="1" size="22"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" y="20" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="201" x="20">
				<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.83" verticalCenter="0" source="shu_json.shu014"/>
				<e:Label text="呆呆鼠 奖励 * 20倍" x="91" verticalCenter="1" size="22"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group anchorOffsetY="0" height="62" y="30" anchorOffsetX="0" left="0" right="201" x="30">
				<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="20" anchorOffsetX="0" width="58" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.83" verticalCenter="0" source="shu_json.shu017"/>
				<e:Label text="调皮兔 奖励 * 50倍" x="91" verticalCenter="1" size="22"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout/>
			</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Group width="290" height="335" x="319" y="75" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:Scroller left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
			<e:Group>
				<e:Label text="一、玩法说明\n  1.玩家需注册帐号方可参与该游戏；\n 2.玩家首先应选择每次打地鼠需要花费的金豆数，然后点击游戏中的地鼠；\n  3.能否打晕地鼠取决于地鼠的概率；\n二、其他说明\n 1.用户不得利用外挂、爬虫软件或其它恶意手段获得奖励，一经发现，我们有权对所有使用非法手段的账号进行不予发奖、冻结、查封等操作。在法律许可的范围内酷睿游戏拥有本活动的解释权；\n 2.受网络影响，页面动画表现可能存在误差，最终中奖结果请以订单详情中的结果为准；" wordWrap="true" size="20" lineSpacing="10" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="290" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
			</e:Scroller>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label text="奖励说明" x="82" y="20" textColor="0xf7c727" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label text="游戏说明" x="401" y="20" textColor="0xf7c727" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
